rules_text:
Suspend 5–{1}{U} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
When Starbog Bullfrog enters, you may return another target creature to its owner’s hand.
notes:
6+MV Creature

Potential stat buff or protective ability to bring up to par with other similar costed commons from recent sets?

Could restrict bounce to something small.
